Services provided are medical, personal, human service,                                                                                                 employment and education. Pay as you go service. Available to all Harnett County residents. For using Medicaid call Department                                                                                                                                                         of Social Service for scheduling. Operating hours: M-F 4am - 6pm and scheduling hours: 8am-3pm M-F.
Provides transportation to those who qualify in cumberland County
Provides transportation/Token Program-$4 each way/A Pines Line-fixed route for Southern Pines/Aberdeen $2, they also provide out of county transportation go to website to see schedule

Notes: Contact by phone or email
ResourceDescription: Provides rides to Primary Care Appointments, Physical Therapy, Lab Centers, Pharmacies and more.
